```{python}
import pandas as pandas
import numpy as np
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns

import yfinance as yf
```

```{python}


crypto_symbols = ['BTC-USD', 'ETH-USD', 'AVAX-USD', 'FTT-USD', 'LUNC-USD', 'BF-USD']

crypto_data = yf.download(crypto_symbols, period='max', auto_adjust=True)['Close']


fig, axes = plt.subplots(len(crypto_symbols), 1, figsize=(14, 14), sharex=True)
fig.suptitle('Cryptocurrency Price of some Scam and non-scam Tokens', fontsize=16)

for i, symbol in enumerate(crypto_symbols):
    axes[i].plot(crypto_data.index, crypto_data[symbol], label=symbol)
    axes[i].set_ylabel('Price in USD')
    axes[i].legend()
    axes[i].grid(True)

plt.xlabel('Date')
plt.tight_layout(rect=[0, 0, 1, 0.96])
plt.show()
```
